GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
smb3: fix temporary data corruption in insert range

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 0cdde8460c304283d4ebe3f767a70215d1ab9d4e, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 7fe6fe95b936084dce6eedcc2cccadf96eafae73. For more details please see the references link.
